Level 2: Proficient: Participates in resolving minor conflicts with guidance.
Level 3: Competent: Manages and resolves conflicts within the team independently.
Level 4: Advanced: Leads conflict resolution efforts across teams, ensuring constructive outcomes.
Level 5: Expert: Develops conflict resolution frameworks, mentors others in conflict management, influences organizational culture.
